data.event: The Belk Foundation announced Wednesday a $5,000 grant to Hope’s Wings in Richmond to help fund general operating costs for the shelter.
Hope’s Wings was founded in 2006 by a group of committed community members who identified a need for domestic violence services in Madison County.
The shelter opened in February 2009 and is already at 75 percent capacity.
